mapper.insert: insert into sky_take_out.dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{name},#{categoryId},#{price},#{image},#{description},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select: select count(id) from sky_take_out.dish where category_id=#{id}
